member.name: T:Terrasoft.Messaging.Common.Controllers.GetTelephonyConfigController
member.summary: Controller class for getting telephony config of DataService.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Messaging.Common.Controllers.MsgUtilServiceController.LogInMsgServer(Terrasoft.Messaging.Common.NewSessionParameters)
member.returns: Unique identifier if authorization is successful, otherwise - empty string.

member.name: M:Terrasoft.Messaging.Common.Controllers.MsgUtilServiceController.UpdateCall(Terrasoft.Messaging.Common.Call)
member.summary: Updates call information in database and timestamp of last update.
member.returns: If update was successful - call identifier in database, otherwise - error message.
